German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • IPA(key): /ɡəˈʃtɔʁbən/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Adjective[edit]

gestorben (not comparable)

  1. deceased (no longer alive)

Verb[edit]

gestorben

  1. Past participle of sterben.
